turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu güzel tasarımı yapmışsan, herkes takdir edecektir.
english_example_sentence: If you had made this beautiful design, everyone would have appreciated it.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты создал этот красивый дизайн, все бы его оценили.
